    Method
    Description
    Application
    Applicant.createApplication(BTO bto, int roomType)
    Creates a new BTO application for this applicant, if eligible.
    Application
    Officer.createOfficerApplication(BTO bto, boolean clash)
    Creates an officer application for the given BTO project if eligible.

    Retrieves an application by its ID.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Application>
    Project.getAppByBTO(int btoId, String type, String status)
    Retrieves applications filtered by BTO ID, type, and optional status.
    List<Application>

    Retrieves applications submitted by a specific user.
    Methods in BTO with parameters of type Application
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Applicant.bookBTO(Application application)
    Requests to proceed with booking a unit for a successful application.
    String
    Officer.bookBTO(BTO bto, Application application)
    Books a room on behalf of an applicant if the application is valid and the officer is authorised.
    void
    Manager.updateAppStatus(Application app, int status, BTO bto)
    Updates the status of an application (officer or applicant) based on manager decisions.
    void
    Applicant.withdrawApplication(Application application)
    Requests to withdraw a successful or booked application.
